mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ris1201.PKRIS1201, ris1201.HSPT_ID, ris1201.VIST_DVSN, ris1201.PTNT_ID, ris1201.PTNT_NM, ris1101.GNDR_DVSN, ris1101.BRTH, ris1201.ORDR_DATE, ris1201.TRTM_DPRT_CD, ris0102.MDDL_KR_NM, ris1201.WARD_CD, ris1201.UNIT_CD, ris1201.DSRD_DATE FROM ris1201 LEFT JOIN ris1101 ON ris1201.PTNT_ID = ris1101.PTNT_ID LEFT JOIN ris0102 ON ris0102.MDDL_CD = ris1201.ORDR_DOC_ID and ris0102.HSPT_ID = ris1201.HSPT_ID ORDER BY ris1201.PKRIS1201;
SELECT PKRIS1201, ELCT_TRTM_YN, IMGN_CD, ORDR_NM, EXMN_NOTE_TEXT, ORDR_NOTE_TEXT, PMNT_YN, PRTB_IMGN_YN, EMRG_YN, DC_YN, RETK_YN FROM ris1201 WHERE PKRIS1201 = #{pkris1201} and HSPT_ID = #{hsptId};
